SHOW_ANIMATION
SHOW_ANIMATION:
Default value : 225ms cubic-bezier(0.4,0.0,1,1)
HIDE_ANIMATION
HIDE_ANIMATION:
Default value : 195ms cubic-bezier(0.0,0.0,0.2,1)

Functions

src/services/keyboard.service.ts

_applyConfigDefaults
_applyConfigDefaults(config: undefined)

Applies default options to the keyboard configs.

Parameters :
  • config

    The configuration to which the defaults will be applied.

src/utils/keyboard-errors.ts

throwContentAlreadyAttached
throwContentAlreadyAttached()

Error that is thrown when attempting to attach a keyboard that is already attached.
